Posts.Content: hi. i had my first chemo on Monday 7th and have gone from feeling ok to feeling very sick. Find it hard as no one can tell youÂ  how long it will all last for. any ideas?
Posts.Title: nausea

Posts.Content: thanks for the reply. it has helped. this morning i felt much better and just feel a little sick now. I will continue with the meds they gave me. I will have a word when i next go or if this continues beyond the start of next week. I am on 3 weekly chemo so now know what to expect a bit and how to listen to my body and do as it tells me. Carol
